channel.title: Questions, Help Please Read!

item.title: Questions, Help Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Hello, I have a few questions,

  1. How Can i change my logout timer.

2.How Can I Pretty much remove donator from the donator shop and make it require tokkuls.

3.How Could I make it so you cannot open the chest unless you have 5 pk points.

  1. Im not sure if this is server sided or client sided, but when i click my special bar, it doesnt glow, like it usually does just stays plain, so idk if im using special or not.

5.Ive added the command ::drunk But It makes me look like im hovering when i walk, heres the command code:

      if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("drunk") && donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
            setAnimation(848);
            playerSE = 848;
            playerSEW = 848;
            playerSER = 848;
            playerSEA = 848;
            playerEnergy = 999;

            sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149);
            sM("you're Officially Hammer'd.");
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("sober") && donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
            sM("You Sober Up");
            playerSE = 0x328;
            playerSEW = 0x333;
            playerSER = 0x338;
            playerSEA = 0x326;
            playerEnergy = 100;
            playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
            sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149);
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
        }

And My Server Base is 317, if you could help me with any that would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!
